languages.text: "Все эльдары — мерзкие ксеносы, лучше очистить галактику от их присутствия".
"All Aeldari are vile xenos. The galaxy would be better off purged of their presence."
languages.original_text: "Все эльдары — мерзкие ксеносы, лучше очистить галактику от их присутствия".

traits.locale_text: "All Aeldari are vile xenos. The galaxy would be better off purged of their presence."
"All Aeldari are vile xenos. The galaxy would be better off purged of their presence."
"All Aeldari are vile xenos. The galaxy would be better off purged of their presence."
"All Aeldari are vile xenos. The galaxy would be better off purged of their presence."

languages.text: «Todos los Aeldari son xenos repugnantes. La galaxia estaría mucho mejor si la purgásemos de su presencia».
languages.original_text: "All Aeldari are vile xenos. The galaxy would be better off purged of their presence."

traits.locale_text: «Todos los Aeldari son xenos repugnantes. La galaxia estaría mucho mejor si la purgásemos de su presencia».

languages.text: 「アエルダリは例外なく邪悪な異種族だ。その存在は抹殺した方が銀河系のためだ」
languages.original_text: "All Aeldari are vile xenos. The galaxy would be better off purged of their presence."

traits.locale_text: 「アエルダリは例外なく邪悪な異種族だ。その存在は抹殺した方が銀河系のためだ」

languages.text: “所有艾达灵族都是卑鄙的异形。如果把他们彻底消灭，银河系会变得更好。”
languages.original_text: "All Aeldari are vile xenos. The galaxy would be better off purged of their presence."

traits.locale_text: “所有艾达灵族都是卑鄙的异形。如果把他们彻底消灭，银河系会变得更好。”

languages.text: « Tous les Aeldaris ne sont que d'ignobles xénos. La galaxie se porterait infiniment mieux si elle pouvait être débarrassée de leur présence. »
languages.original_text: "All Aeldari are vile xenos. The galaxy would be better off purged of their presence."

traits.locale_text: « Tous les Aeldaris ne sont que d'ignobles xénos. La galaxie se porterait infiniment mieux si elle pouvait être débarrassée de leur présence. »

languages.text: "Alle Aeldari sind widerwärtige Xenos. Die Galaxie wäre besser dran, wenn sie ausgelöscht werden."
languages.original_text: "All Aeldari are vile xenos. The galaxy would be better off purged of their presence."

traits.locale_text: "Alle Aeldari sind widerwärtige Xenos. Die Galaxie wäre besser dran, wenn sie ausgelöscht werden."

languages.text: "Tüm Aeldariler, gözümde aşağılık zenolardan ibaret. Galaksinin bu menfur varlıklardan arınması lehimize olacaktır."
languages.original_text: "All Aeldari are vile xenos. The galaxy would be better off purged of their presence."

traits.locale_text: "Tüm Aeldariler, gözümde aşağılık zenolardan ibaret. Galaksinin o menfur varlıklardan arınması lehimize olacaktır."
